Overview
TMPS001:Die_Temperature_Sensor

Overview

The DTS has to be enabled before it can be used.The sensor can be powered up by calling TMPS001_Enable() . The temperature measurement is started by calling TMPS001_StartMeasurement(). The result of the measurement can be obtained by calling TMPS001_ReadTemp().

Note:

  • Measurement data is available certain time after measurement started.Hence user needs to poll the status of DTS by calling TMPS001_GetStatus() before reading the temperature.
  • The first measurement after the DTS is powered delivers a result without calibration adjustment and should be ignored.
